item.text: When you go to war against your enemies and see chariotry and troops who outnumber you, do not be afraid of them, for the Lord your God, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt, is with you.

As you <st data-num="07126" class="">move forward</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st>, the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="05066" class="">approach</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">soldiers</st>,<n id="2" />

“<st data-num="08085" class="">Listen</st>, <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>! <st data-num="03117" class="">Today</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="07131" class="">moving forward</st> to do <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> your <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>. Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03824 07401">be fainthearted</st>. Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="0408" class="">and</st> <st data-num="02648" class="">tremble</st> <st data-num="0408" class="">or</st> <st data-num="06206" class="">be terrified</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">because of</st> them,
for the Lord your God goes with you to fight on your behalf against your enemies to give you victory.”

Moreover, the <st data-num="07860" class="">officers</st> are to <st data-num="01696 0559">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">troops</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="0376 0834">among you</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="01129" class="">built</st> a <st data-num="02319" class="">new</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02596" class="">dedicated</st><n id="3" /> it? He may <st data-num="01980 07725">go</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="06435" class="">lest</st> he <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> and <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">else</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="02596" class="">dedicate</st> it.

Or <st data-num="04310" class="">who</st> <st data-num="0376 0834">among you</st> has <st data-num="05193" class="">planted</st> a <st data-num="03754" class="">vineyard</st> and <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02490" class="">benefited from</st> it? He may <st data-num="01980 07725">go</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="06435" class="">lest</st> he <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> and <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">else</st> <st data-num="02490" class="">benefit from</st> it.

Or <st data-num="04310" class="">who</st> <st data-num="0376 0834">among you</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="0781" class="">become engaged to</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> but has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">married</st> her? He may <st data-num="01980 07725">go</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st>, <st data-num="06435" class="">lest</st> he <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> in <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> and <st data-num="0376" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">else</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">marry</st> her.”

<st data-num="03254" class="">In addition</st>, the <st data-num="07860" class="">officers</st> <st data-num="03254" class="">are</st> to <st data-num="01696 0559">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">troops</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">among you</st> <st data-num="03373" class="">is afraid</st> and <st data-num="07390 03824">fainthearted</st>? He may <st data-num="01980 07725">go</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">home</st> so that he will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04549" class="">make</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">fellow soldier’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03824" class="">heart</st> as <st data-num="04549" class="">fearful</st><n id="2" /> as his <st data-num="03824" class="">own</st>.”
Then, when the officers have finished speaking, they must appoint unit commanders to lead the troops.
When you approach a city to wage war against it, offer it terms of peace.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> it <st data-num="06030" class="">accepts</st> your <st data-num="07965" class="">terms</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06605" class="">submits</st> to you, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> in it will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> your <st data-num="04522 05647">slaves</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> it does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07999 05973">accept terms of peace</st> but <st data-num="06213" class="">makes</st> <st data-num="04421" class="">war</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> you, then you are to <st data-num="06696" class="">lay siege</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> it.
The Lord your God will deliver it over to you, and you must kill every single male by the sword.

However, the women, little children, cattle, and anything else in the city—all its plunder—you may take for yourselves as spoil. You may take from your enemies the plunder that the Lord your God has given you.
This is how you are to deal with all those cities located far from you, those that do not belong to these nearby nations.
As for the cities of these peoples that the Lord your God is going to give you as an inheritance, you must not allow a single living thing to survive.
Instead you must utterly annihilate them—the Hittites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites—just as the Lord your God has commanded you,
so that they cannot teach you all the abhorrent ways they worship their gods, causing you to sin against the Lord your God.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="06696 0413">besiege</st> a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> for a <st data-num="07227" class="">long</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st> while <st data-num="03898 05921">attempting</st> to <st data-num="08610" class="">capture</st> it,<n id="1" /> you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07843 05080 05921 01631">chop down</st> its <st data-num="06086" class="">trees</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> fruit<n id="3" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> them and should <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> them <st data-num="03772" class="">down</st>. A <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> is <st data-num="03588 0120">not human</st> that <st data-num="06440" class="">you</st> should <st data-num="0935 04692">besiege</st> it!<n id="4" />
However, you may chop down any tree you know is not suitable for food, and you may use it to build siege works against the city that is making war with you until that city falls.
